data.comment: The first-half is under way at bet365 Stadium - Norwich kick-off to start the match.
Goal! Emiliano Buendia gives Norwich a 0-1 lead in Stoke.
In the minute 19, Danny Batth is booked for the home team.
Marco Stiepermann (Norwich) gets a yellow card.
Goal! Teemu Pukki extends Norwich's lead to 0-2.
In the minute 29, Steven Fletcher (Stoke) has received a first yellow card.
Lee Gregory is replacing Steven Fletcher for Stoke at bet365 Stadium.
The away team replace Tim Krul with Michael McGovern.
In the minute 45, The first-half has come to a close in Stoke.
The second-half has commenced. Stoke with the kick-off.
Tom Ince is on a sub for Josh Tymon for Stoke.
In the minute 46, Michael O'Neill is making the team's third substitution at bet365 Stadium with Nathan Collins replacing Tommy Smith.
Goal! Teemu Pukki extends Norwich's lead to 0-3.
Grant Hanley (Norwich) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 60, Norwich make their second substitution with Przemyslaw Placheta replacing Josh Martin.
Mario Vrancic is replacing Marco Stiepermann for the away team.
Emiliano Buendia (Norwich) has received a yellow card from Geoff Eltringham.
In the minute 69, Emiliano Buendia (Norwich) has been booked for the second time by the referee and is off!
Tyrese Campbell strikes to reduce the deficit to 1-3 at bet365 Stadium.
The away team have replaced Teemu Pukki with Christoph Zimmermann. This is the fourth substitution made today by Daniel Farke.
In the minute 79, Nathan Collins (Stoke) strikes with a header to reduce the deficit to 2-3 at bet365 Stadium.
Stoke make their fourth substitution with Sam Vokes replacing Danny Batth.
The match is over. Final score 2-3.
